item.title: Comment on Finally at Peace by Karin Christian
item.dc:creator: Karin Christian
item.description: Dear Kim and Cyndie, I am so sorry to hear about the loss of your mom. Your mom did my hair for so many years and I enjoyed our long conversations every time. She was so proud of you and your spouses, and Samantha. Sue expressed to me how fortunate she was. Besides being strong, Sue was also a very caring person who went the extra mile to help her customers/friends. The last time that I saw your mom we reminisced about how many years we had known each other and she had a big smile on her face when we hugged good-bye. I will remember her smiling. Sue will be greatly missed.
item.content:encoded: Dear Kim and Cyndie, I am so sorry to hear about the loss of your mom. Your mom did my hair for so many years and I enjoyed our long conversations every time. She was so proud of you and your spouses, and Samantha. Sue expressed to me how fortunate she was. Besides being strong, Sue was also a very caring person who went the extra mile to help her customers/friends. The last time that I saw your mom we reminisced about how many years we had known each other and she had a big smile on her face when we hugged good-bye. I will remember her smiling. Sue will be greatly missed.

item.title: Comment on Fall-o-Meter Reset – Sunday, September 16, 2018 by Rie T Buzzwlli
item.dc:creator: Rie T Buzzwlli
item.description: I've been so busy this summer, Went to Cincinatti in August and Hershey Park, PA for Linda's book signing. Debbie and I went to Towsen Univercity for Heidi's registration. My sister-in law and her friends visiting me from Japan since 9/15. I'm going to take them to NY on 19th and her friends are going to see Niagara fall and then take the city tour. Be back home on 22nd. They are leaving on 29th. Could you tell Sue "Happy Birthday" XOXOXOXO
item.content:encoded: I’ve been so busy this summer, Went to Cincinatti in August and Hershey Park, PA for Linda’s book signing. Debbie and I went to Towsen Univercity for Heidi’s registration. My sister-in law and her friends visiting me from Japan since 9/15. I’m going to take them to NY on 19th and her friends are going to see Niagara fall and then take the city tour. Be back home on 22nd. They are leaving on 29th. Could you tell Sue “Happy Birthday” XOXOXOXO

item.title: Comment on Everyone’s on Vacation! – Monday, December 18, 2017 by suebadmin
item.dc:creator: suebadmin
item.description:
Hi Debbie!
I am sorry to hear that you have been having difficulty with your legs. I know that it is very frustrating. It's great that you are continuing with the water aerobics! Definitely keep that up! I'll pass your message onto my mom and will make sure that she calls you soon. I hope you have a Merry Christmas and feel better soon.
Take care, Kim
item.content:encoded:
Hi Debbie!

I am sorry to hear that you have been having difficulty with your legs. I know that it is very frustrating. It’s great that you are continuing with the water aerobics! Definitely keep that up! I’ll pass your message onto my mom and will make sure that she calls you soon. I hope you have a Merry Christmas and feel better soon.

Take care,
Kim

item.title: Comment on Prepping for Vacation – Tuesday, December 12, 2017 by suebadmin
item.dc:creator: suebadmin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../../prepping-for-vacation-tuesday-december-12-2017/index.html#comment-234">Barbara Fitzgerald</a>.
Hi Barbara!
I will definitely pass your message on to my mom. We'll get her back to the casinos again. I am sure she'll LOVE the MGM!
Have a Merry Christmas! Kim
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Barbara Fitzgerald.

Hi Barbara!

I will definitely pass your message on to my mom. We’ll get her back to the casinos again. I am sure she’ll LOVE the MGM!

Have a Merry Christmas!
Kim
